UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_LIGHTING_Ambient_Template
UseTemplate.BOUNCE_POTENTIOMETER_PERCENT: (A:LIGHT CABIN ON:1, Bool) 0.45 * (A:LIGHT POTENTIOMETER:5, Percent) * (A:LIGHT CABIN ON:2, Bool) 0.45 * (A:LIGHT POTENTIOMETER:6, Percent) * + (A:LIGHT CABIN ON:3, Bool) 0.1 * (A:LIGHT POTENTIOMETER:4, Percent) * +

DefaultTemplateParameters.LOWER_LIMIT: 0 (A:THROTTLE LOWER LIMIT, percent) - 100 (A:THROTTLE LOWER LIMIT, percent) - /
